question: Which of the following is the reason behind the different seasons to occur?
option1: Sun is moving around the earth
option2: Of revolution of the earth around the sun on its orbit
explanation: The four seasons happen because of the tilt of the Earth\'s axis. At different times of the year, the sun\'s rays hit different parts of the globe more directly. The angle of the Earth\'s axis tilts the Northern Hemisphere towards the sun during the summer.
